text: On and after July 1, 1943, a bond shall not be required on account of military supplies or equipment issued by the Department of the Army for military instruction and practice by the students of high schools in the District of Columbia.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 31-2208.

1973 Ed., § 31-1115.

DC CODE § 38-908

Current through December 11, 2012

heading.catch_text: Bond not required for supplies issued by Department of the Army.
